gen:link.label:label: BV692: If the assets with CIC '##4#' are higher than 30% of the investments and assets held for index-linked and unit-linked contracts, then S.06.03 - Collective investment undertakings - look-through approach should be reported, unless the undertaking is exempted. -->Template 1: S.01.01; Template 2: S.02.01; Template 3: S.06.02; Template 3: S.06.02; Filter: {S.06.02, c0290} like '##4#'; Expression: If (sum({S.06.02, c0170,(sNNN)})/({S.02.01, r0070,c0010}+{S.02.01, r0220,c0010}))>0.3 then {S.01.01, r0150,c0010} = [s2c_CN:x1]

BV692: If the assets with CIC '##4#' are higher than 30% of the investments and assets held for index-linked and unit-linked contracts, then S.06.03 - Collective investment undertakings - look-through approach should be reported, unless the undertaking is exempted. -->Template 1: S.01.01; Template 2: S.02.01; Template 3: S.06.02; Template 3: S.06.02; Filter: {S.06.02, c0290} like '##4#'; Expression: If (sum({S.06.02, c0170,(sNNN)})/({S.02.01, r0070,c0010}+{S.02.01, r0220,c0010}))>0.3 then {S.01.01, r0150,c0010} = [s2c_CN:x1]
